what: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: Retrieve data UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API. UIS provides public access 4,000 indicators focusing education, science technology, culture, communication. package part econdataverse family packages aimed helping economists financial professionals work sovereign-level economic data. ðŸ’¡ UIS API known rate limiting, 100,000 record limit request. larger data downloads, UIS recommends [Bulk Data Download Service (BDDS)](https://databrowser.uis.unesco.org/resources/bulk.

title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: can install uisapi CRAN via: can install development version uisapi GitHub :

title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: Load package: fetch indicators specific entities, can call: can get information available entities via: list available indicators can retrieved via: API supports versioning can retrieve versions using: interested current default version, can use parameter default_only: API return 100,000 records query, data requested, API call fail 400 http status code. need data, UIS recommends using Bulk Data Download Service (BDDS). can get list available files via: bulk files consists multiple CSV files uisapi package currently provide automatic importers files. Rather, can use base utils download specific file, unzip , read files. instance:
code: library(uisapi) uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2"),   start_year = 2010,   end_year = 2020 ) #> # A tibble: 36 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2012  91.6 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2013  91.5 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2014  92.9 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2015  93.2 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2016  93.8 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2017  94.6 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2018  95.1 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2019  95.7 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2020  96.3 #> # â„¹ 26 more rows uis_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 462 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  5 ALA       Ã…land Islands        NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    <NA>         #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    <NA>         #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    <NA>         #> # â„¹ 452 more rows uis_get_indicators() #> # A tibble: 4,637 Ã— 7 #>    indicator_id indicator_name     theme last_data_update last_data_update_desâ€¦Â¹ #>    <chr>        <chr>              <chr> <date>           <chr>                  #>  1 10           Official entranceâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  2 10403        Start month of thâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  3 10404        End month of the â€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  4 10405        Start of the acadâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  5 10406        End of the academâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  6 13           Theoretical duratâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  7 200101       Total population â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  8 200144       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  9 200151       Population aged 6â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> 10 200343       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> # â„¹ 4,627 more rows #> # â„¹ abbreviated name: Â¹â€‹last_data_update_description #> # â„¹ 2 more variables: data_availability <list>, entity_types <list> uis_get_versions() #> # A tibble: 11 Ã— 4 #>    version           publication_date    description                    theme    #>    <chr>             <dttm>              <chr>                          <list>   #>  1 20250917-73f4b95c 2025-09-18 13:31:02 September 2025 Data Release    <tibble> #>  2 20250910-c4a5b1fe 2025-09-12 02:55:22 September 2025 release         <tibble> #>  3 20250416-f6707727 2025-04-16 14:45:45 Dropping data for Hong Kong câ€¦ <tibble> #>  4 20250325-6f032139 2025-03-25 23:19:35 Dropping indicators with valuâ€¦ <tibble> #>  5 20250312-e714f4e9 2025-03-12 14:01:51 Dropping Moldova 2024 populatâ€¦ <tibble> #>  6 20250225-2ae60fad 2025-02-27 15:29:19 February 2025 DR               <tibble> #>  7 20241121-61101499 2024-11-21 23:37:39 SCCI Data refresh â€“ Nov 2024 â€¦ <tibble> #>  8 20241113-98786d81 2024-11-21 18:57:35 SCCI data refresh              <tibble> #>  9 20241030-9d4d089e 2024-10-30 17:28:00 Drop data for CIV on MYS for â€¦ <tibble> #> 10 20240913-b8ca1963 2024-09-15 14:44:07 Glossary Update                <tibble> #> 11 20240910-b5ad4d82 2024-09-11 06:15:13 September 2024 Data Release (â€¦ <tibble> uis_get_versions(default_only = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 4 #>   version           publication_date    description                 theme    #>   <chr>             <dttm>              <chr>                       <list>   #> 1 20250917-73f4b95c 2025-09-18 13:31:02 September 2025 Data Release <tibble> uis_bulk_files() #> # A tibble: 12 Ã— 3 #>    file_name                                     file_url last_updated_descripâ€¦Â¹ #>    <chr>                                         <chr>    <chr>                  #>  1 "SDG 4 Education - Global and Thematic Indicâ€¦ https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  2 "Other Policy Relevant Indicators (OPRI)"     https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  3 " SDG 9.5 - Research and Development (R&D)"   https:/â€¦ February 2025          #>  4 "Research and Development (R&D) â€“ Other Poliâ€¦ https:/â€¦ February 2025          #>  5 "SDG 11.4 Protect the Worlds Cultural and Naâ€¦ https:/â€¦ February 2025          #>  6 "Demographic and Socio-economic Indicators"   https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  7 "Education Non Core Archive February 2020"    https:/â€¦ <NA>                   #>  8 "Research and Development (R&D) Archive Marcâ€¦ https:/â€¦ <NA>                   #>  9 "Innovation Archive April 2017"               https:/â€¦ <NA>                   #> 10 "Cultural employment Archive June 2019"       https:/â€¦ <NA>                   #> 11 "Cultural trade Archive June 2021"            https:/â€¦ <NA>                   #> 12 "Feature Film Archive October 2024"           https:/â€¦ October 2024           #> # â„¹ abbreviated name: Â¹â€‹last_updated_description download.file(   "https://uis.unesco.org/sites/default/files/documents/bdds/092024/SDG.zip",   destfile = "SDG.zip" ) unzip("SDG.zip") read.csv("SDG_COUNTRY.csv")

title: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API
text: Contributions uisapi welcome! â€™d like contribute, please follow steps: Create issue: making changes, create issue describing bug feature â€™re addressing. Fork repository: receiving supportive feedback package authors, fork repository GitHub account. Create branch: Create branch changes descriptive name. Make changes: Implement bug fix feature. Test changes: Run tests ensure changes donâ€™t break existing functionality. Submit pull request: Push changes fork submit pull request main repository.

what: Get files available for download via UIS BDDS â€” uis_bulk_files
title: Get files available for download via UIS BDDS â€” uis_bulk_files
text: Retrieves information files available UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) Bulk Data Download Service (BDDS).

title: Get files available for download via UIS BDDS â€” uis_bulk_files
Get files available for download via UIS BDDS â€” uis_bulk_files
text: data frame information files: file_name Character. name data set. file_url Character. URL data set. last_updated_description Character. Information last update.

title: Get files available for download via UIS BDDS â€” uis_bulk_files
code: # \donttest{ # Download available files for bulk download uis_bulk_files() #> # A tibble: 12 Ã— 3 #>    file_name                                     file_url last_updated_descripâ€¦Â¹ #>    <chr>                                         <chr>    <chr>                  #>  1 "SDG 4 Education - Global and Thematic Indicâ€¦ https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  2 "Other Policy Relevant Indicators (OPRI)"     https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  3 " SDG 9.5 - Research and Development (R&D)"   https:/â€¦ November 2025          #>  4 "Research and Development (R&D) â€“ Other Poliâ€¦ https:/â€¦ November 2025          #>  5 "SDG 11.4 Protect the Worlds Cultural and Naâ€¦ https:/â€¦ November 2025          #>  6 "Demographic and Socio-economic Indicators"   https:/â€¦ September 2025         #>  7 "Education Non Core Archive February 2020"    https:/â€¦ NA                     #>  8 "Research and Development (R&D) Archive Marcâ€¦ https:/â€¦ NA                     #>  9 "Innovation Archive April 2017"               https:/â€¦ NA                     #> 10 "Cultural employment Archive June 2019"       https:/â€¦ NA                     #> 11 "Cultural trade Archive June 2021"            https:/â€¦ NA                     #> 12 "Feature Film Archive October 2024"           https:/â€¦ October 2024           #> # â„¹ abbreviated name: Â¹â€‹last_updated_description # }

what: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
title: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
text: Retrieves data UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API specified entities, indicators, time periods.

title: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
code: uis_get(   entities = NULL,   indicators = NULL,   start_year = NULL,   end_year = NULL,   version = NULL )

title: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
text: entities Character vector. entity IDs (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 codes) retrieve data . Must provide either parameter indicators . See uis_get_entities list supported entities. indicators Character vector. indicator IDs retrieve data . Must provide either parameter entities . See uis_get_indicators list supported indicators. start_year Numeric character. starting year data retrieval period. NULL, start year constraint applied. end_year Numeric character. ending year data retrieval period. NULL, end year constraint applied. version Character. API version use. NULL, default version used. See uis_get_versions list supported versions.

title: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
text: data frame following columns: entity_id Character. ID entity (geoUnit). indicator_id Character. ID indicator. year Numeric. year observation. value Numeric. value indicator given entity year.

title: Get data from the UIS API â€” uis_get
code: # \donttest{ # Get all data for a single indicator uis_get(   indicators = "CR.1" ) #> # A tibble: 2,163 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 AFG       CR.1          2011  40.7 #>  2 AFG       CR.1          2015  54.5 #>  3 AFG       CR.1          2022  44.2 #>  4 AGO       CR.1          2015  60.0 #>  5 ALB       CR.1          2000  95.2 #>  6 ALB       CR.1          2005  98.9 #>  7 ALB       CR.1          2009  98.2 #>  8 ALB       CR.1          2017  97.4 #>  9 ARG       CR.1          2000  95.5 #> 10 ARG       CR.1          2001  95.6 #> # â„¹ 2,153 more rows  # Get all data for a single country uis_get(   entities = "BRA" ) #> # A tibble: 48,310 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       10            1999     0 #>  2 BRA       10            2000     0 #>  3 BRA       10            2001     0 #>  4 BRA       10            2002     0 #>  5 BRA       10            2003     0 #>  6 BRA       10            2004     0 #>  7 BRA       10            2005     0 #>  8 BRA       10            2006     0 #>  9 BRA       10            2007     0 #> 10 BRA       10            2008     0 #> # â„¹ 48,300 more rows  # Get data for multiple indicators and countries uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2") ) #> # A tibble: 66 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2001  82   #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2002  84.1 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2003  86.6 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2004  87.4 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2005  87.9 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2006  89.3 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2007  88.4 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2008  88.4 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2009  88.6 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #> # â„¹ 56 more rows  # Get data for multiple indicators and countries and specific time range uis_get(   entities = c("BRA", "USA"),   indicators = c("CR.1", "CR.2"),   start_year = 2010,   end_year = 2020 ) #> # A tibble: 36 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id indicator_id  year value #>    <chr>     <chr>        <int> <dbl> #>  1 BRA       CR.1          2011  89.9 #>  2 BRA       CR.1          2012  91.6 #>  3 BRA       CR.1          2013  91.5 #>  4 BRA       CR.1          2014  92.9 #>  5 BRA       CR.1          2015  93.2 #>  6 BRA       CR.1          2016  93.8 #>  7 BRA       CR.1          2017  94.6 #>  8 BRA       CR.1          2018  95.1 #>  9 BRA       CR.1          2019  95.7 #> 10 BRA       CR.1          2020  96.3 #> # â„¹ 26 more rows # }

what: Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
title: Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
text: Retrieves information geographical entities (countries, regions, etc.) available UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
text: version Character. API version use. NULL (default), API's default version used. See uis_get_versions list supported versions.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
text: data frame information geographical entities: entity_id Character. unique identifier entity. entity_name Character. name geographical entity. entity_type Character. type entity (e.g., country, region). region_group Character. Information region grouping.

title: Get geographical entities from UIS API â€” uis_get_entities
code: # \donttest{ # Download entities for default version uis_get_entities() #> # A tibble: 462 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    NA           #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    NA           #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    NA           #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    NA           #>  5 ALA       Ã…land Islands        NATIONAL    NA           #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    NA           #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    NA           #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    NA           #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    NA           #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    NA           #> # â„¹ 452 more rows  # Download entities for a specific version uis_get_entities("20240910-b5ad4d82") #> # A tibble: 475 Ã— 4 #>    entity_id entity_name          entity_type region_group #>    <chr>     <chr>                <chr>       <chr>        #>  1 ABW       Aruba                NATIONAL    NA           #>  2 AFG       Afghanistan          NATIONAL    NA           #>  3 AGO       Angola               NATIONAL    NA           #>  4 AIA       Anguilla             NATIONAL    NA           #>  5 ALA       Ã…land Islands        NATIONAL    NA           #>  6 ALB       Albania              NATIONAL    NA           #>  7 AND       Andorra              NATIONAL    NA           #>  8 ANT       Netherlands Antilles NATIONAL    NA           #>  9 ARE       United Arab Emirates NATIONAL    NA           #> 10 ARG       Argentina            NATIONAL    NA           #> # â„¹ 465 more rows # }

what: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
text: Retrieves information indicators available UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
code: uis_get_indicators(   version = NULL,   disaggregations = FALSE,   glossary_terms = FALSE )

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
text: version Character. API version use. NULL (default), API's default version used. See uis_get_versions list supported versions. disaggregations Logical. TRUE, includes disaggregation information indicators. Default FALSE. glossary_terms Logical. TRUE, includes glossary terms associated indicators. Default FALSE.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
text: data frame information indicators: indicator_id Character. unique identifier indicator. indicator_name Character. name indicator. theme Character. theme indicator. last_data_update Date. last update date. last_data_update_description Character. description last update date. data_availability List column. Contains nested information data availability, including total record count timeline min/max years. entity_types List column. Contains information entity types associated indicator.

title: Get indicator definitions from UIS API â€” uis_get_indicators
code: # \donttest{ # Download indicators uis_get_indicators() #> # A tibble: 4,636 Ã— 7 #>    indicator_id indicator_name     theme last_data_update last_data_update_desâ€¦Â¹ #>    <chr>        <chr>              <chr> <date>           <chr>                  #>  1 10           Official entranceâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  2 10403        Start month of thâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  3 10404        End month of the â€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  4 10405        Start of the acadâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  5 10406        End of the academâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  6 13           Theoretical duratâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  7 200101       Total population â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  8 200144       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  9 200151       Population aged 6â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> 10 200343       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> # â„¹ 4,626 more rows #> # â„¹ abbreviated name: Â¹â€‹last_data_update_description #> # â„¹ 2 more variables: data_availability <list>, entity_types <list>  # Download indicators with glossary terms and disaggregations uis_get_indicators(disaggregations = TRUE, glossary_terms = TRUE) #> # A tibble: 4,636 Ã— 9 #>    indicator_id indicator_name     theme last_data_update last_data_update_desâ€¦Â¹ #>    <chr>        <chr>              <chr> <date>           <chr>                  #>  1 10           Official entranceâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  2 10403        Start month of thâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  3 10404        End month of the â€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  4 10405        Start of the acadâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  5 10406        End of the academâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  6 13           Theoretical duratâ€¦ EDUCâ€¦ 2025-09-17       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  7 200101       Total population â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  8 200144       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #>  9 200151       Population aged 6â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> 10 200343       Population aged 1â€¦ DEMOâ€¦ 2025-09-09       September 2025 Data Râ€¦ #> # â„¹ 4,626 more rows #> # â„¹ abbreviated name: Â¹â€‹last_data_update_description #> # â„¹ 4 more variables: data_availability <list>, entity_types <list>, #> #   disaggregations <list>, glossary_terms <list> # }

what: Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions
title: Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions
text: Retrieves information available versions UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API.

title: Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions
Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions
text: default_only Logical. Indicates whether current default version retrievend. Defaults FALSE.

title: Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions
text: data frame following columns: version Character. version identifier. publication_date Date-time. date version released. description Character. description version. theme List column. element nested data frame containing information themes available version, columns: theme_id, theme_last_update, theme_description

title: Get available UIS API versions â€” uis_get_versions

what: uisapi: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API â€” uisapi-package
title: uisapi: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API â€” uisapi-package
text: Retrieve data UNESCO Institute Statistics (UIS) API https://api.uis.unesco.org/api/public/documentation/. UIS provides public access 4,000 indicators focusing education, science technology, culture, communication.

title: uisapi: Access the UNESCO Institute for Statistics API â€” uisapi-package
text: Maintainer: Christoph Scheuch christoph@tidy-intelligence.com (ORCID) [copyright holder]

title: uisapi (development version)
text: Fix bug parsing last_data_update uis_get_indicators() due date format changes API.

title: uisapi 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-03-06 Initial release uis_get(), uis_get_entities(), uis_get_indicators(), uis_get_versions(), uis_bulk_files()
